about_the_game:
It is a turn-based tower defense, where elemental dragons replace towers, and you can combine their powers into devastating combinations! Supported by traps, curses, and ghosts in your arsenal, plan your defense and defeat all the thieves to prove no human being can even touch YOUR treasure!

Destroy waves of enemies in various ways

Big dragons have strong, simple abilities, while small elemental ones are great for interesting combos

For example, the combination of water and electricity will shock the enemy

You have five elements to combine: fire, ice, poison, electricity, and water

Discover unique dragons

Some dragons require a completely different approach to defense

Create your own dragon lair

Change the lighting, decorations, banners, and interior colors

Gameplay Features:

Raise Elemental Dragons: Nurture and grow smaller elemental dragons on each level. Each elemental dragon brings unique abilities, ability recharge rate, incubation rate.

Elemental Mastery: Harness the power of fire, ice, water, poison, and electricity. Combine these elements to create devastating effects like steam, electrocution, freezing, burning, epidemics, poisoning and explosions.

Set Traps: Strategically place traps to outsmart and defeat waves of enemies. Plan your moves carefully to maximize their effectiveness.

Variety of Enemies: Face off against a diverse array of foes, each with unique traits. Fast thieves, shield-bearers that block projectile damage, and more will challenge your tactical skills.

Puzzle and Strategy: The game is designed as a turn-based puzzle where planning and strategy are key. While it's easy to complete levels with a one-star rating, achieving three stars requires careful thought and execution.

Why Play Treasure Protector?

If you enjoy games that blend strategy, puzzle-solving and a bit of fantasy, Treasure Protector is for you. With its unique elemental combinations and strategic depth, it offers a rewarding challenge for those willing to master its mechanics.

name: Treasure Protector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or discrete card supporting DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent supporting DirectX 12
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX compatible sound card
